attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: First of all, who let this man have an app. I was instantly offended as the first thing I see on this app is an tall orange man who is a racist, homophobic, and horrible human being. The picture of the tall orange man made my daughter cry when she opened this app on my phone giving her nightmares for weeks. And this was just overall the most disgusting piece of junk I’ve ever witnessed🤮.

attributes.title: OH PLEASE
attributes.review: this app was so disappointing, and disturbing when I opened it all I saw was pictures that made my cat throw up😾. When I showed this app to my unicorn it died just because all the information was so fake and stupid it choked my unicorn. I give this a one star fake and a waste of time and now I have to go to my unicorns funeral and take my cat to a therapist.🤮🤮

attributes.title: BURNT CORN HAIRED ORANGUTAN!!!!
attributes.review: This is probably one of the worst apps i have ever purchased. The graphics are terrible, as soon as i open the app a very disturbing picture of a burnt corn haired orangutan appeared on my screen and i am just over all not happy, very grossed out and mildly disappointed and disgusted that people think it’s appropriate to put such a horrific photo on the app. WOULD 10/10 NOT RECOMMEND🤢🤮🦧🌽

attributes.title: Ughh I can’t with this app
attributes.review: This app is a breeches of security. I’m positive it records everything. The app is very very glitchy too. Not to mention the creator of this app has killed millions with his “power”. He shouldn’t have power over an app that he could also kill people. Also this app is completely useless and no one uses for talks about it.

attributes.title: Absolutely horrifying😭
attributes.review: I have to say, I had high hopes for this app🤠🥳but it did not impress👎👎👎👎. Immediately upon opening the app, I was traumatized😰by the hairless rat on the opening screen 🐀 As I proceeded to shield my eyes in terror 🛡 👀 I witness a LIVE rat, IN MY LIVING ROOM, scurry from underneath my couch!!!!😱😱needless to say, this app infested my home with vermin🤬🤬luckily I have bobs bugs be gone on speed dial🥰💖🤩WOULD NOT RECOMMEND!! ALERT YOUR PEERS OF THIS UNACCEPTABLE ABUSE OF TECHNOLOGY

attributes.title: very bad app 👎🏼
attributes.review: I was very interested in the app and opened it up like normally but after doing so it started glitching and turned into a black screen which then turned into inappropriate images of sum Cheeto looking man 🟠... we need to stop this from happening and get rid of this app immediately( rip everyone’s eyes I am very sorry )

attributes.title: disgusting
attributes.review: I would give this app 0 stars if I could. it’s filled with images that haunt me to this day and probably will for the rest of my life. DOWNLOAD THIS APP AT YOUR OWN RISK. ever since I opened it, my life has felt like a horror movie that I can’t ever escape. every time I close my eyes, I see his face looking over me like he wants to eat me. I swear this app cursed me or unleashed a demon of some sorts.

attributes.title: True true horror
attributes.review: What awaited me when I opened this app I could never prepare for. I’ve never liked the color orange, but when I opened the app it engulfed me in its horrible hue. This app exposed me to all sorts of racism, homophobia, and as a trump supporter obviously I was flabbergasted that I was blind to all of it. I despise this app, and now I despise this once honorable job, because it has been disgraced by a Cheeto

attributes.title: Yuck🤮
attributes.review: My phone got so hot and now it’s acting like an iphone6 with the beta update it plays music that doesn’t correlate at all with the app it glitches and freezes and when you click out it’s on the screen I can’t even delete it 👁👄👁 anywho this app is appist because all apps matter and now my phone is corrupted by an orange

attributes.title: no💗
attributes.review: i personally don’t like this app because as soon as you open the app you see a CHEETO and it brings back memories of when i saw him naked🤮 i am traumatized and i had to bleach my eyeballs. my little sister has seen the pictures and she literally threw up. it’s embarrassing that he’s our president. 0/10 for this app. he’s a disappointment
